plot: Hotaru Tachibana is a girl disguised as a boy. Through strange circumstances she finds herself drawn into the world of survival games by a host, Masamune Matsuoka. The two form a team with ero-manga artist Tohru Yukimura and aim to be the be the best in Japan.
ending_theme: "Gunjō Survival" (群青サバイバル; Ultramarine Survival) by Mikako Komatsu
"Tic Tac" (チクタク) by Mikako Komatsu [eps 8]
